com.esri.gpt.framework.jsf
Class PageContext

java.lang.Object
  com.esri.gpt.framework.jsf.PageContext

public class PageContext
extends Object

Represents the context for an active JSF based page.

The PageContext is a JSF managed bean in request scope.

          Default constructor.
